infotexts.entitydescription.fds: A strange diving suit built using alien relics, its emmits strange noise...
infotexts.entitydescription.hcds: Possibly crafted by some pirates. Strangely covered in blood...
infotexts.entitydescription.legacysuit: An old version of a diving suit. Surprisingly, it is still able to withstand the cruel Europan pressure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.noise: The noise causes strange stuff in your head.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bloodthirst: You have growing urge to drink blood.
